definition: The term "umklappbar" refers to an object or feature that possesses the ability to be folded or flipped, typically to change its shape or size. It is commonly used to describe items that can be easily transformed or adjusted for convenience or storage purposes.

examples.german: Das umklappbare Bett ist sehr praktisch.
examples.english: The foldable bed is very practical.

examples.german: Die umklappbare Tischplatte ermöglicht mehr Platz im Raum.
examples.english: The foldable tabletop allows for more space in the room.

examples.german: Der umklappbare Stuhl ist leicht zu transportieren.
examples.english: The foldable chair is easy to transport.

examples.german: Die umklappbare Rückenlehne sorgt für zusätzlichen Komfort.
examples.english: The foldable backrest provides additional comfort.

examples.german: Das umklappbare Fahrrad passt problemlos in den Kofferraum.
examples.english: The foldable bicycle fits easily into the trunk.
